thread.section_title: AMOMA.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von AMOMA.com | www.amoma.com
thread.title: Mitchell

author: Mitchell
title: Mitchell
text:
Loved my time at Park Plaza in Boston,although I was given an upgrade,as the room booked was very small.
The upgrade was on top floor and excellent.
The hotel is in a great location,just metres from Boston Common,and the hop on off bus stop.
Also easy walking to the city.
Irish pub close by with reasonable food,although they don't like sole diners.
Definitely recommend Boston Park Plaza.
